articles.title: Dopamine and serotonin in human substantia nigra track social context and value signals during economic exchange - Nature.com
articles.description: In this article, Batten and colleagues measure fast neurotransmitter release in patients undergoing awake brain surgery. As volunteers play an economic game with human and computer partners, dopamine and serotonin track social context and value statistics.
